strings.heading: Registration was successful
strings.message: Your registration was successful, please check your username and password in your e-mail. Thanks.

errorEmailAddressAlreadyRegistered.p: Sorry, registration has FAILED because you are already a registered user.

errorEmailToAddressFailed.p: Sorry, registration has FAILED because we could not send an email to the address you gave us.
Please check your details and try registering again.

errorProfileRequestFailed.p: Your request for Editor access could not be delivered.
Please contact the helpdesk at yourname@yoursite.org or ph: xxx-xxxxxxxx
